text: manitanukku munnalum, pinnalum totarntu varakkutiya (malakkukal) irukkirarkal. Allahvin kattalaiyal avarkal avanaip patukakkirarkal; enta oru camutayattavarum, tam nilaiyayait tame marrik kollata varaiyil, allah avarkalai niccayamaka marruvatillai innum allah oru camutayattarukkut tivinaiyai natinal, ataittatuppavar evarumillai - avarkalukku avanaittavira tunai ceyvor evarum illai
